alert.note: Alert for La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 6:43PM MDT until March 17 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Saguache County East of Continental Divide Below 10000 Feet and the La Garita Mountains above 10000 feet. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Saguache County East of Continental Divide below 10000 Ft
